sn35.61:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the principle for depleting all fuel.
sn35.61:4.3: And what is the principle for depleting all fuel?
sn35.61:4.4: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights.
sn35.61:4.5: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.61:4.6: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.61:4.7: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple becomes disillusioned with the eye, sights, eye consciousness, eye contact, and feeling.
sn35.61:4.10: When they are released, they understand: ‘I have completely depleted grasping.’
sn35.61:4.12: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and phenomena.
sn35.61:4.13: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.61:4.14: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.61:4.15: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple becomes disillusioned with the mind, phenomena, mind consciousness, mind contact, and feeling.
sn35.61:4.18: When they are released, they understand: ‘I have completely depleted grasping.’
sn35.61:4.19: This is the principle for depleting all fuel.”
